◆ FitSphereInCloud()

TomatoCoordinates pointcloud_processing::FitSphereInCloud ( const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 &  input,
pcl::PointXYZ  roi,
bool  reset_rviz_cloud = false 
)

Fits a sphere model into a pointcloud by croping the pointcloud around the region of interest (roi), segregating the surface plane and fitting a ransac sphere into the remaining points.

Parameters
inputPointcloud containing sphere-like objects
roiregion of interest --> where to search for shpere in the pointcloud
reset_rviz_cloudflag to clear pointcloud visualized in rviz (topic /summit_xl/tomato_clouds)
Returns
TomatoCoordinates
